record.jsxtip: Fires before a record from this matrix column is adopted by another object. Canceling this event prevents the CDF adoption from occurring.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the CDF jsxid of the record to adopt.
the object that will adopt the record(s).

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this matrix column and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this matrix column is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this matrix column before it is removed from the DOM.
